title: LastPass 2022 Breach Led to Years-Long Cryptocurrency Thefts, TRM Labs Finds
description: The encrypted vault backups stolen from the 2022 LastPass data breach have enabled bad actors to take advantage of weak master passwords to crack them open and drain cryptocurrency assets as recently as late 2025, according to new findings from TRM Labs.
